Name: Kaleidoscope of Hongzhen
Description: Xunjing, an editor for "Wutherium Geographic", is seeking a photographer. According to him, this is related to an existential crisis in his career...
QuestDesc: Xunjing, an editor for "Wutherium Geographic", is seeking a photographer. According to him, this is related to an existential crisis in his career...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, you must be the Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me introduce myself. I'm Xunjing, an editor for Wutherium Geographic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Word travels fast at the Pioneer Association. I heard you're the hero of Jinzhou and Hongzhen. If I wasn't working for a geography magazine, I'd snatch the chance to feature you in a heartbeat...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha... Sorry, occupational habit. Ahem, speaking of which, I'm in the middle of a career crisis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, um... our magazine's cooking up something special about Hongzhen's cultural scene.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, we're staring down the barrel of the deadline, and we're missing a few crucial snaps in our stack...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I mess this up, the editor-in-chief will have my head!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hate to admit it, but I'm not exactly a pro with a camera, despite running the photography column.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And it's too late to call in a photographer from Jinzhou now. Say, you've got a knack for photography too, don't you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! You're just as modest as they say you are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! That is reassuring.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In that case, if you have time... Could you take a few photos for me? Just three, four shots.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you! You'll be doing me a great service.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, right, mind if I accompany you? I could use a bit of a wander myself, you know, just in case a bolt of inspiration decides to pay me a visit!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hongzhen is famous for its Sagaci Springs. Let's go take some photos of the hot springs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, perfect! That's the angle we want! This shot will be a winner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stand over here to take it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Can we get a panoramic view of the whole of Hongzhen from here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right! Let's snap an overhead shot of Hongzhen. Our special edition still needs a cover photo, and this will give readers a wonderful perspective of the town.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because you know, to most folks, Hongzhen is still an enigmatic, secluded place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A quaint hot spring, nestled under the shade of an ancient tree... The setting is perfect!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While the world changes around us, Hongzhen's timeless traditions live on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, people soak in the same springs their ancestors did, washing away their worries with the same clear waters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is... quite special.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, back to business... I spotted some peculiar rings on the mountains across the gate. Let's capture them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow... quite the spectacle. I wonder what these massive rings are for. Could they be... ancient ceremonial sites of Hongzhen's forebears?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... they might be relics from the Pre-Lament era. Hmm... Perhaps colossal colliders or planetary engines? Anyway, let's snap a picture.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That about does it. I can't thank you enough for these wonderful pictures!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, yes, I will arrange payment as soon as I can!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I practically dragged you all over Hongzhen for these photos, didn't I?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just gotta deliver these photos before the deadline. Then it's onto the nitty grittyâ€”editing, typesetting, and printing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Just thinking about all that work makes me depressed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The folks in Hongzhen seem to have it easy. No tyrannical editors breathing down their necks with deadlines every day. They can just relax and enjoy that gorgeous mountain view every day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm tempted to quit and move to Hongzhen myself...

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe things aren't as good as they look.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! Just kidding. Our editor-in-chief is scarier than a TD Outbreak. If anyone even thinks about quitting, they'd be torn apart.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Grass isn't always greener on the other side, huh? Sigh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, thanks for everything. I better get back to the office. Until next time, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here we are! Let's look for the perfect spot...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, look at that ancient tree! Such a picturesque sight! Come, let's capture it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me have a look... Hm, this turned out pretty good. Maybe we'll feature it in an "Explore Hongzhen" column. Already got the headline: "The Mountain Town's Unsolved Riddle."

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But let's include the peaks flanking the rings in our shot. That'll give a sense of how enormous and awe-inspiring they are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See any good spots nearby?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Can we get a panoramic view of the whole of Hongzhen from here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right! Let's snap an overhead shot of Hongzhen. Our special edition still needs a cover photo, and this will give readers a wonderful perspective of the town.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because you know, to most folks, Hongzhen is still an enigmatic, secluded place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From up here, every part of the town is visible. Ancient relics and market stalls dot the landscape, connected by winding footpaths.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xunjing
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's surprising is, despite the ancient lore painting Hongzhen as an isolated paradise, what I see is a vibrant, bustling community.
